profile:
At Canadian Roofing Company Ltd., we take pride in upholding 
the highest standard of quality & custom workmanship. We have been a family business for over 25 years and endeavor to keep our employees well trained in order to maintain our commitment to you of a job well done.  We are a Toronto based business and as a result only service the outskirts of the GTA by appointment only and for these clients interested in an estimate, there is a fee of $150 + hst which is refundable upon booking with us. It would be our pleasure to provide you with a detailed estimate for the work you are interested in having done. In addition to this, our goal is to answer any questions you may have and to educate you on the entire process, from start to finish. We look forward to hearing from you.

profile:
Serving Toronto and some of the surrounding GTA, No west end services...Like Mississauga Brampton nothing west of Bathurst and the 401.
Mega City Roofing Inc. has attained high standards for re-roofing with many years of experience. Mega City Roofing Inc. has served top-quality products and we strive to be the experts in the business. Our experienced talent and efforts are always continual in our services. We provide information on roofing products and solutions to better our customers requirements.

Mega City Roofing Inc. specializes in re-roofing residential, industrial, and commercial roofs. Even with the best quality roofing systems, your roof is only as good as the quality of the installation. Our excellent product knowledge and highest standards of workmanship assure you of a long-lasting quality roof.

All of our skilled staff is trained in roofing methods, materials, and current Occupational Health and Safety Standards, with many years of actual hands on experience and training. Our service includes inspection, consultation and recommendation of appropriate methods, materials and estimates to resolve our customers individual requirements. We have competitive prices and written guarantee's, customer friendly service and staff. We are fully insured and licensed, our employee's are covered under the WSIB to construct a safe working environment. Call us today and get your FREE estimate inspection and remember a roof is only as good as it's installation. Mega City Roofing Inc. you can trust us for all your roofing needs.

profile:
MCBM Roofing Services is not your typical roofing company. We are a family-owned and operated company, specializing in residential and commercial roof installation, replacement, and repair. Our mantra is to always exceed our customers’ expectations.
Founders Marcelo Sosa and Carolina Quagliata have a passion for providing a high level of service to their clients. With 15 years of roofing experience and 20 years in customer service between them, you are guaranteed exceptional quality workmanship and a lasting relationship built on open and honest communication.
We know how crucial the structural integrity of your roof is. It protects your family and your valuables from the elements, helps make your house more energy efficient, and adds value to your home. That is why we are committed to providing our customers with the highest quality roof construction, at a reasonable price. From the beginning of a project to its completion, we pride ourselves on our high standards, professionalism, and superior results. We deliver on our promises, and we guarantee your satisfaction.

profile:
Established in 1976, Luc's Roofing is a family owned roofing business that has been servicing the GTA for over 40 years. 
We offer shingle roofing and flat roofing services, plus low-slope, cedar and slate roofing.
 
Our goal is to ensure each and every customer has the security of a job well done. 
That's why we stress superior products, superior workmanship and superior service. 

Our motto, "We've got your peace of mind covered," guides all our activities and we work hard to live up to it! 

Please visit our website at www.lucsroofing.com
416-222-2672

We are following all provincial guidelines for Covid-19.
products:
(1) Roofing: shingle, flat and cedar
(2) Roof repairs and slate repairs 
(3) Flat and shingle roof insulation   
(4) Skylights.
services: Free inspections. Written estimates. Shingle and flat roofing and some complementary services. Our lead foreman is qualified as a Master Shingle Applicator and Flat Roof Installer.
brands: Certainteed, Owens Corning, Velux, Grace and Lomanco.
specialities: Our staff have worked on a vast number of projects and excel in anything from large, straight-away surfaces to small, intricate jobs. We are highly aware of excellence and try to exceed our customers' expectations.
name: Luc's Roofing Ltd

profile:
For over 15 years Smart Roofing Inc. has provided full service roofing for residential, commercial and industrial customers throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Our skilled, experienced craftsmen, aided by the reliable products, can accurately assess your roofing situation and expedite any job quickly and to your full satisfaction. 

We are dedicated to providing quality, professional installation and service commitment with fair prices. For your protection we are fully insured, bonded and licensed, and are proud members of the Better Business Bureau. We offer from 6 to 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship and only experienced crews of roofers are used. Smart Roofing has maintained these standards over the years and will continue to do such as our family of satisfied customers grows and shares their experience with peers, family and friends. 

Please contact us today for a free estimate or visit our showroom. At Smart Roofing Inc. "We protect what you value most". Make the SMART choice.
_____________________________________________

We do all types of Roofs, shingles, flat Roof Top Quality is our priority.High Skillz Roofing Guaranteed Great Jobs. We perform all levels of roofing. We offer start-to-finish solutions for every project. We also make sure that our customers always happy in the end of the job.

We specialize Roofing, including skylights, if its damaged. We also do small repairs.every small roofing defects can be fixed immediately with in 24 hours emergency service 
High skillz Roofing provides Best clean quality work with over 20 years materials warranty Available to call us you won't be disappoint.We have many years if Roofing experience.

Installation, removal, replacement and repair roofs of all styles.
Emergency service. Replacing skylights. Fix leaks in roof. High Skillz Roofing has been protecting Residential, Commercial, Industrial and Institutional properties in and around Toronto(GTA) for over 10 years. over all these years, our extreme commitment to excellence and customer service make us one of the most trusted name in the Roofing industry.We have provided our expertise to hundreds of customers and our customer base is forever expanding. profile:
Our team of dedicated Roofers work efficiently with the highest degree of attention to detail and quality to ensure a complete and problem-free roof for our clients. The Roofers use the highest quality products, properly installed as per the manufactures installation guidelines and coupled with experienced workmanship and backed by an extensive Workmanship Warranty to give our clients the extra peace of mind.

The Roofers thrive to be an industry leader for the installation and service of roofing systems in the Greater Toronto Area. This mission is based on an element of Service, Price, and Quality. profile: WE ELIMINATE YOUR RISK 97% of our customers recommend us (We have surveys dating back since 2004, all available for your review) Saving You Time by concisely providing all of the information you need to make a decision Saving You Money by installing your project the right way the first time Reducing Your Stress by providing you with consistent quality through proven systems and procedures - 2016 GEM of Etobicoke-Lakeshore – awarded for exceptional service provided to the residents of Etobicoke- Lakeshore, presented by local MPP Peter Milczyn - 2016 Guardian “Readers' Choice” Award - Voted Etobicoke's Best Roofing Company for the 15th consecutive time - Peter Walker has been awarded membership of CertainTeed Roofer's Advisory Council for 2016, there are less than 50 members in all of North America and members must be proven leaders in the roofing industry - 2015 winner of Homestars' “Giving Back Award” - 2015 CertainTeed Platinum Award for highest customer satisfaction surveys TrackRecord - #1 in Canada for most CertainTeed SureStart Plus Long Term Warranty Roofs Installed - Better Business Bureau (BBB) “A+” Rating; no complaints - Certified Contractors Network Member - Infinity Windows from Marvin Exclusive Distributer of fibreglass replacement windows in Central and West Toronto and Mississauga - CertainTeed Select Shingle Master (Tenured Member Highest Ranking Available) - Manufacturer’s 50-year non-prorated, transferable labour and material warranty - 2015 Guardian "Readers' Choice" Award – Voted Etobicoke's Best Roofing Company - 2014 CertainTeed Diamond Award for highest customer satisfaction surveys TrackRecord - 2014 Guardian “Readers’ Choice” Award – Voted Etobicoke’s Best Roofing Company - 2014 Guardian "Readers' Choice" Award – Voted Etobicoke's Best Window Company - 2014 Ranked Top 20 in North America for most CertainTeed SureStart Plus Long Term Warranty Roofs Installed - 2013 Ranked Top 20 in North America for most CertainTeed SureStart Plus Long Term Warranty Roofs Installed - 2013 Guardian “Readers’ Choice” Award – Voted Etobicoke’s Best Roofing Company - 2013 Guardian "Readers' Choice" Award – Voted Etobicoke's Best Window Company - 2012 Ranked Top 20 in North America for most CertainTeed SureStart Plus Long Term Warranty Roofs installed - 2012 Town Crier “Silver” award winner – Roofing Category - 2011 Town Crier “Best in Town” – Central Toronto’s Best Roofing Company award winner. We specialize in: *Shingle roofs: Steep-slope & low-slope *Flat roofs *Skylights *Chimneys *Repairs, maintenance and snow & ice removal from roofs *Eaves Troughs *Siding *Fibreglass windows & doors (Infinity from Marvin) *Patio Doors & Entrance Doors Peter & Greg Walker Contracting has been selected by Marvin Canada as GTA's exclusive supplier and installer of Infinity windows and doors with fibreglass frames. Infinity™ is top of class in all areas: design, structural strength & stability, thermal performance/energy efficiency, window seal performance, corrosion resistance, lowest maintenance, colour retention, climate durability (hot & cold) and maximum glass area. Visit www.infinitywindows.com for complete product information. *Energy Efficiency: Home comfort - no drafts, energy saving, top thermal performance, high performance low EII glass is standard. *Superior Materials: Low maintenance, durable, looks good over time, Infinity's Ultrex fibreglass frame is 8x stronger than vinyl, extremely durable - won't warp, dent or fade. *Appearance & Design: Attractive, easy to operate, easy to wash, designed to replicate the beauty of traditional wood window. *Professional Installation: Peace of mind, no-hassle experience, installed by local window experts, transferable warranty *Total Value: Satisfaction of the best windows for the best price, superior performance, appearance, design, reliability & expertise. Marvin has been one of North America's largest manufacturers of custom windows for nearly 100 years. Ultrex fibreglass from Marvin has been used for nearly 20 years. Exterior & Interior colour options are available as well as thermal glass package and other options.

profile:
Guildwood Roofing has provided quality roofing to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002.
You have a lot to protect under one roof.
 
That's why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.
 
If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job.
 
You can count on us:
The price is right
 
Surprising to many, our high-quality job doesn't come with a high price tag!
Safety is our top priority

Rest assured, from the moment we step onto your property, to the moment we leave, all measures will be taken to protect you and your home.
We're tidy
 
At the end of each workday, we'll organize and dispose of all loose materials. When the job is complete, we'll use a magnetic broom to remove any stray nails.
We're fast
 
We aim to have most jobs completed within one to two days.
You're protected
 
We're fully licensed and insured.
we offer a 10-year written guarantee on our workmanship, and depending on your selection, ad 25-year to lifetime product guarantee.
Guildwood's got you covered!

profile:
Since 1986, Spiros Aluminum & Roofing Inc. has provided roofing and exterior remodelling services to residential and commercial customers throughout the GTA and surrounding areas. 
***
We’re a family owned and operated business based in Richmond Hill, fully licensed and insured to offer quality roofing repairs and installations along with aluminum, window, and door services. Spiros Aluminum & Roofing Inc. is insured with our own liability insurance and are in very good standing with the Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB). With our insurance, your property is protected from damages and bodily injury liability.
***
Spiros Aluminum & Roofing Inc.'s crew is made up of professionally skilled tradesmen with several years of hands-on experience. On our crew are skilled estimators ready to visit your home for a free inspection and written quote. All estimates are free, competitive, and with no obligation to you.
***
Referrals are available upon request.
***
Mission Statement
Our mission is to provide our customers with dependable and friendly service while delivering a professional, high quality product and ensuring 100% customer satisfaction.

profile:
ROYAL YORK ROOFING has been successfully servicing the Toronto and GTA for years. Specializing in residential, commercial, industrial and institutional new Roof Installations and Repairs, we are able to service all your roofing needs in an experienced and timely manner. Our vastly diverse portfolio of past work, speaks for itself in the lengths and bounds we go to in ensuring the best roofing choice for your specific roofing needs.
 
SERVICES: We specialize in a broad spectrum of roofing services including, new sloped (asphalt shingle, cedar, slate, metal, copper) and flat roof (2-ply, 4-ply, EPDM, TPO) installations, re-roofing, roof repairs/maintenance, and sheet metal works. Additionally, we offer a wide variety of related services that help eliminate hiring multiple contractors which in exchange you get hassle free roof, and the luxury of having to deal with just one company without the middle man as we take care of all the arrangements. Some of our additional services include: eavestroughs, copper / aluminum works, siding, waterproofing, masonry, carpentry, siding, attic ventilation inspection, demolition and disposal.
 
WHY ROYAL YORK ROOFING: When choosing our company, we guarantee a professional and experienced team member to assess your needs. Our representative will explain how we can help you and offer you an honest and fair quote. Our team of professional roofers is fully insured, licensed and have an impeccable standing with the WSIB. All our work is stamped with written workmanship warranties for up to 15 years depending on materials used; a commitment that truly shows our confidence and credence in our work.

profile:
Bros. Roofing has provided high-quality roofing services to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002. Bros. Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. 

Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. 

You have a lot to protect under one roof.
We are fully licensed and insured.
We offer a 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship, depending on your selection, add 30-year to lifetime product guarantee.

Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets Bros. Roofing contractors apart.

That is why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.

If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job. 
Surprising to many, our high-quality job does not come with a high price tag!
All our services are competitively priced and we provide educational information as well. 

You can count on us:
Most Affordable and Excellenct Roofing Service For You~~

profile:
John Stewart, owner of J. STEWART ROOFING Ltd, has been installing roofs for the Toronto area homes and small businesses for over twenty five years. John is an experienced roofer having started roofing at a very young age he learned the basics of roofing and gradually became proficient in both shingling and then flat roofing. These two very different types of roofs require a different knowledge base and a real understanding of this can only be gained through actual hands-on work, so that one can see exactly how the materials work together and why.  

Flat roofs are particularly tricky to do and have become a specialty for J. Stewart Roofing Ltd. (For further details check out the newspaper article from the Toronto Star on this website. It is vital to gain real knowledge of the materials & techniques to not get stuck in just one way of doing things and stop there. Larry and John know how important it is to always keep up with the new roofing materials being invented and how they actually work in the field. In this way they have gained a greater library of knowledge on which to draw from, enabling them to know what combination of materials best for each unique customer’s job are presented to them. 

We specialize in all areas of roofing:

Shingle Roofs 	Flat Roofs 	Repairs & Maintenance
Asphalt 	Modified Bitumen

profile:
Three Bro Squirrels Roofing Ltd. is a family owned and operated, residential and commercial roofing contractor focused on providing quality service roofing in Toronto and the GTA. We specialize in the installation, maintenance, and repair of various residential and commercial roofing systems. Three Bros Squirrels Roofing is fully licensed and insured. Our 24 hour service and quick response makes the difference in roofing Toronto throughout all seasons!

Whether it involves flat or shingle roofs, skylights or roof repair and maintenance, the experts at Three Bro Squirrels Roofing are dedicated to the highest level of customer service and quality workmanship offered in Toronto and the GTA roofing industry.

Our services include inspection, consultation and recommendation of proper methods, materials and estimates to solve all our customers’ individual requirements. Our work is fully guaranteed, backed up by great warranties and provides our customers with piece of mind in knowing that their roof will last for years to come. That's how confident we are about our roofing services.

profile:
At Leading on Edge Roofing we strive to be complete in every aspect. Whether it be a repair, roof replacement or emergency service, our thorough attention to detail covers your roofing needs completely. We provide in house metal fabricating and have strategic alliances with electrical and plumbing contractors for a complete range of related services. Our insistence on safety training for our employees and in taking measures on-site means that your people and ours enjoy a safe working environment. Along with our reputation for honesty and standing behind our work, we believe in good communication so you know how your job is coming. Complete job, complete assurance, complete satisfaction.    

CLEAN:

Although Clean is not a word normally associated with the roofing industry, it describes our company in more ways than one. Our “clean site” program ensures your facility will be kept tidy for the duration of the job. We go the extra mile, pressure washing, sweeping, raking etc. to ensure that our customers are satisfied. And when it comes to relationships - clean means integrity. Its how we treat our suppliers, our employees and of course our customers. Rest assured that everything we do is responsible, legal and safe. In short, we care.

COSTS EFFECTIVE: 
At Leading on Edge Roofing we believe in fairness and respect. We only recommend the services you need. From a brand new roof to our annual service programs, we are committed to providing you with cost effective solutions to meet all your roofing needs! We choose only durable quality products for our experienced and efficient team to apply, ensuring your roof is done right. “Done right” means longer lasting. Now that’s saving you money and headaches.

At Global One Roofing, we only employ skilled tradespeople who are certified to do their job. All of our crew members are full-time, trained and certified employees. We maintain a meticulous cleanup policy on every job site. We have insurance and WSIB Coverage. We also offer roof inspections and a full line of repair services. Save money, increase your home energy rating, improve the comfort inside your home and help the environment. Emergency and temporary repair services are available around the clock. 
 
Global One Roofing has been in operation since 2005 and is a family operated business. Over that time we have seen changes in materials and methods but maintain our original commitment to providing high quality results for our clients. 
 
We stand behind our work with one of the best warranties in the business, 10 years. This is only possible as a result of three things: the use of premium products, good workmanship and careful inspection of completed work.

profile:
Top off your home with Awash Roofing and Renovation, offering the best in professional roofing and renovation services. From torch-on roofs to green and recyclable EcoStar™ sustainable slate roofing, we are able to handle roofs of all kinds.

We're able to provide you with the best possible options and use only the highest-quality products.

Owner and operator Kebreab is able to provide you with detailed information, sample products,and professional consultation, always keeping in mind your needs and budget. We have also taken the initiative to provide our customers with the latest innovations. Learn more about our roofing and renovation services today. Keep out leaks and insulate your home with flat and shingle roofing systems installed by our company.
services:
Roof Repair

Any roof material may be in need of repair from time to time. having your roof occasionally inspected and/or repaired by professional roof repair contractors will increase your home's resale value and reduce any risk of moisture intrusion. Noticing broken, torn or missing shingles is a sign that the roof might need to be repaired or replaced. In some cases, the entire roof may not need to be replaced, only repaired. Any obvious deterioration or leaks are also signs that your shingle or flat roof may be in need of repair.

Shingles

Count on Awash Roofing and Renovation to install shingle roofing systems in the Toronto, Ontario area. Our roofing and home renovation professionals have what it takes to give your home the best. We are the perfect choice, thanks to our years of experience installing, repairing, and maintaining these roofing systems.

Siding

Our different siding products protect your home from hard climate: the sun, the snow storms, the thunderstorms can cause real damage to your house.
Nothing will impact the appearance of your home more dramatically than the type of siding you choose. We sell the material that suits the style of your house and also fits your lifestyle.

Flat Roofs

Awash Roofing and Renovation specializes in installing a two-ply roofing system that is more commonly known as a "torch-on roof," consisting of a fiberglass-reinforced or polyester mat sandwiched between two layers of rubberized asphalt. These roofing systems are very durable but must be installed by professionals as an improperly installed torch-on roof will likely fail within the first 2 years. These flat roofs are an attractive option that is also very durable. Contact us to schedule our professional roofing services today.

"Green" Roofs

Go green with Eco-Star synthetic slate roofing, offering superior performance and durability. EcoStar products are manufactured with recycled rubber and plastics, making them highly flexible, sustainable, and environmentally friendly.
Renovations

We have the expertise and knowledge to get all your home renovations done for you. Whether you need your basement finished or your livable space remodeled, you can count on us for everything from start to finish. We use licensed trades to complete the required task to deliver the scope of work required to complete the job.

Eavestrough Soffit Fascia

Awash Roofing & Renovation takes great pride and care in all of our installations. Each eavestrough installation begins with a conscientious inspection of eaves, fascia boards and soffits. This is done so there are no surprises during the installation process.
Our seamless 5-inch eavestroughs are machined on site, thus avoiding the risk of breaking and scratching during shipping. Installed with hangers, our eavestroughs can be affixed to any type of roof or building structure.
name: Awash Roofing & Renovation

profile:
City roofing and aluminum co. has been in business since 1994, over all these years, our extreme commitment to excellence and customer service make us one of the most trusted name in the roofing industry.
Our roofing department offers residential and commercial services including re-roofing; new roof construction and retro-fitting, we install a wide range of materials such as asphalt shingles, metal roofing, composite roof and cedar wood shakes.
Our aluminum department offers complete aluminum product.s and sheet metal work, our crews utilizes state of art tools and equipment to install aluminum soffit, fascia, seamless eavestrough and rainware accessories.
What’s more, in addition to providing re-roofing services and new construction work, we also offer roofing repair services, on-going maintenance service, and roofing inspection consultations.  These services are designed to extend the life of your roof by identifying and fixing the minor problems before they become major issues.
name: City Roofing & Aluminum Co.

profile:
Vassa Enterprises offers homeowners a specialized one on one approach from beginning to end.  Owner and operator Tony Kavai will make sure you choose the right product at the right price.  Not having a sales team allows Tony to know first hand exactly what your expectations are and effectively make sure those expectations are delivered on.  Managing the sale himself also allows Tony to save you the hidden costs of commissions usually paid out to sales people, this he happily passes on to his customers.   To learn more about our product visit www.gerardusa.com

***
 
We offer you a quality stone coated metal roofing product manufactured by GERARD roofing technologies. This outstanding roofing material carries a limited lifetime warranty, which is not only transferable but also non-prorated. Whether your building is a residential house, apartment, commercial building, community house or a church, GERARD roofing tiles, shakes or shingles are the ultimate solution for your roofing need.
Gerard Stone Coated Steel, ‘Canyon Shake’ metal roof tile profile offers the best of all worlds for customers who want the look of wood shake with the strength and security of steel metal roofing.  Unlike wood shake, our premium stone coated steel roofing tiles will never need the costly maintenance, upkeep and replacement that natural wood shake roofs require.

***

Natural wood shake is not water proof, and needs to be maintained / treated for mold and fungus growth, and relies heavily on a vapor barrier underlayment to protect your roof deck. Our stone coated steel tiles are waterproof, and are categorized as a "dry under-deck" roofing system, keeping your roof deck dry year round under the most testing of conditions. With Gerard's stone coated tiles you won't need to treat for mold and fungus, and over the decades, your shake style roof will continue to look beautiful while delivering the best protection, as the day it was installed!
service_area: Toronto, Hamilton, Brantford, London, Kitchener, Waterloo, Guelph, Cambridge, New Hamburg, Port Colborne, Belleville, Barrie, Orillia, Muskoka, Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Brampton, Oshawa, Peterborough, St. Catharines, Niagara Falls, Greater Southern Ontario
products:
Steel Metal Framed Roofing, 
Owners of our stone coated steel roofing products will also enjoy insurance premium reductions thanks to the fact that our metal roof tiles will never burn or blow off as do conventional / natural wood shake tiles. Today, many areas across the US no longer allow natural wood shake roofs, and it is no surprise that Gerard's stone coated Canyon Shake metal roof tiles have become the preferred alternative.
services: Instillation of lifetime roof with a limited lifetime non-prorated and transferable warranty
brands: Gerard's Granite Ridge interlocking steel shingles are easy to install and deliver a lifetime of service and value to the home-owner. Related trims and job specific extrusions and moldings shorten installation times and deliver a fine finished look which you could not achieve with conventional roofing products.
specialities: Residential and commercial application of metal / steel roofing

profile:
Meet the Independent Roof Inspection Team Servicing the GTA
At Independent Roof Inspection Services, we were salesman, estimators, and roofers. Roofing was what we did. We all climbed up ladders, loaded building materials and made a mess. However, when we were done, the property was always thoroughly cleaned up and the roofs didn’t leak anymore. We had a lot of satisfied customers but after years of being roofers, it was time for us to finally try something new. Because owner Dave Baughn had seen many mistakes and bad contractors throughout his years in roofing, he decided something needed to be done – hence, Independent Roof Inspection Services.

Independent Roof Inspection Services is not a roofing company offering to do inspections on the side. As an independent roof inspector, we offer our inspection services at affordable rates to homeowners, property managers, real estate companies, developers and landlords of residential, commercial and industrial properties across the Greater Toronto Area. Our detailed roof inspection reports describe the existing waterproofing, its age and condition, and all of your available options. While you may need to completely replace your roof, other times you might not need a new roof at all. Sometimes a repair or a partial re-roof may suffice. 
We inspect Commercial, Residential and Industrial properties and provide Project Management services, overseeing  flat and shingle re-roofing projects including custom new-build homes.

profile:
Re-Roofing Ontario is a family owned and operated roofing and home improvement company servicing the Greater Toronto Area.  Our expertise includes residential and commercial projects, maintenance and repair of existing roof systems, the installation of seamless gutters and advanced fastening systems and all types of custom aluminum and copper work.

Over the years, the reputation of roofers throughout the Greater Toronto area has suffered due to poor installers, the use of inferior quality materials, and the start up of fly-by-night companies.  It is our goal to revitalize the roofing industry's reputation, by providing the highest quality service and products for our customers.

We take your needs as seriously as you do.  From the smallest leak to a complete re-roofing project, we deliver the same professionalism, dedication and quality. We believe our service and quality provides our customers with piece of mind in knowing that the roof they are purchasing will provide superior weather protection today and for many years to come.
 
Call us for a free quote today at (416) 899-4518! Requests can also be made through our website.

profile:
TorontoRoofing.ca boasts the city's most reliable, quality roofing professionals and diagnostic team. It's owner, Maciej Kiersnowski quickly developed a reputation as a specialist in the GTA after co-founding a roofing company in 2005. In contracting his services, you are promised a thorough and honest assessment of your residential or commercial property, a detailed recommendation of the scope of work required to address your roofing needs, followed by the a superior installation Toronto has come to expect from Maciej and his team.
Specializing in roof replacement, repair, new installations and emergency damage response, your satisfaction is our number one priority. TorontoRoofing.ca is an industry leading company, and our number one goal is to ensure you are left with an outstanding product and best ever contractor experience.

profile:
Mint Roofing Ltd. is a professional roofing contractor that serves residential and commercial property owners in Durham and York Regions.
Our firm is fully licensed, certified and insured. We carry over $ 5 million of liability coverage which provides our clients and contractors peace of mind and protection.

Our team of trained consultants have over 30 years of industry experience and have proudly served thousands of clients across the GTA including home owners, business owners, engineer firms, restoration and insurance companies.

Our business model is a simple one however we mean every word

-  Provide honest advice and exceptional service
-  Keep our promises EVERY time
-  Only install high quality products that provide our clients warranty coverage and protection
- Treat our clients and their homes with unparalleled respect
  
  Do all of these things for an affordable and fair price 
 
Mint Roofing Ltd. have the knowledge, experience and capacity to tackle any roofing, siding, eavestrough or insulation project. 
The team members are easy to work with and respect our clients busy schedules, we will make every effort to meet you at a time that is convenient for you.
We welcome the opportunity to meet with you to review your project, answer any questions or concerns that you have, and ensure that you are educated and comfortable with the products, offerings and options that we recommend for your home or business.

We hope to serve you soon, for more information please visit our website or contact us by phone today

Recently awarded the title of Best of Eastern Ontario for Roofing & Siding companies by HomeStars, Rydel Roofing has more than 30 years of experience as Ottawa's premier roofing service companies. Boasting an A+ BBB Rating, a perfect Facebook Review score and a 97% customer review rating on HomeStars, our business is driven by a passion for elevated customer service, quality craftsmanship and old fashioned honesty. We have been certified to install almost every major roofing and siding product in North America so you can rest assured that our projects are covered under warranty.

Need financing? Ask our team how you can get 24 month ZERO INTEREST equal payments on your latest project!

profile:
George Kent first opened in 1949 and has since completed over 80,000 installations.  We offer home improvement services for  the entire Greater Toronto Area from Oshawa, to Newmarket, to Orangeville, to Burlington, including Oakville, Milton, Brampton, Woodbridge, Mississauga, Etobicoke and all of southern Ontario.  
With this many years of experience, our reputation speaks for itself.  We are the only home improvement company in the GTA that offers a lifetime warranty on the original installation for our windows and roofing.  In comparison, most box stores offer 1 year on the labour and our best competitors offer 5 years.

We specialize in:
* Windows: Enerview Window and Door Solutions, Vinylbilt, Neat Glass, Energy Star, ecoEnergy, Pella, Laminated Sound Reduction Glass
* Window Styles: Casement, Awning, Double Hung, Single Hung, Double Tilt Slider, Single Tilt Slider, Double Lift Out Slider, Single Lift Out Slider, Low Profile Fixed, High Profile Fixed, Custom Shapes, Greenhouses, Bay Windows, Bow Windows
* Doors: Steel & Fiberglass, Enclosures, Patio Doors, Garden Doors, Storm Doors, Entryguard Doors, Dorplex
* Roofing: Shingle roofing, Flat roofing, Tile roofing, lifetime roofing products
* Shingles: Camelot, Capstone, Grand Slate, Slateline, Timberline HD
* Insulation: Spray Foam, Attic, Basement, Roof, Blown Insulation, Exterior Wall Insulation, BASF, Owens Corning
* Siding: Vinyl Siding, Aluminum Siding, Gentek

profile:
Assured Quality Roofing provides roofing and eavestrough services in the GTA for residential and commercial clients. Exceeding Ontario’s building code standards. Excellent customer satisfaction 25 years.

***
 
The reason people choose us over any of our competition is simple; We use the best materials, tradesmen and deliver the best in service and quality. Our tradesmen are paid according to the quality of work, rather than on the speed with which they do the job. This ensures top quality over a speedy job. It is far more important to us to do the job correctly and have a happy customer who recommends us to their friends. You have our guarantee that we will do the job right the first time. 

***
 
We never settle for the minimum building code standards it doesn’t cost a lot to go from a minimum building code standard to exceeding the building code standards. The owner is on every job site and has personally over seen thousands of jobs to a successful conclusion. You will be talking directly with the owner about the work you want done and any of the concerns you have. We also have a list of previous customers should you wish to have references.

profile:
Founded by Bruno Levesque in 1990, Let It Rain has grown from a single roofing contractor to become Mississauga, Toronto, and the GTA’s expert roofing company. Our business has grown because of our many customer referrals. At Let It Rain the quality of our work does the advertising for us. Our goal is to provide you with the most durable and energy efficient roof system by providing the best quality roofing in Toronto, Mississauga, Etobicoke and the Greater Toronto Area.  

Commitment To Quality:
Let It Rain is committed to continual research and development for all aspects of your metal, sloped or flat roof system. This includes shingles, ventilation and insulation. It is this unyielding commitment to quality that allows us to create the most durable and energy efficient roof for your home. We use custom parts and always make custom calculations to determine how we can maximize the life of your complete roof system. At Let It Rain we take pride in knowing that you are as comfortable under your roof as we are under ours. 

SERVICES INCLUDE:

Shingle Roofing:
Let It Rain installs a wide range of roofing shingles, including cedar, slate and fiberglass asphalt shingles. Let It Rain can replace your roof beautifully and ensure that it's guaranteed for life.

Roof Insulation & Attic Upgrades:
Installing a new roof is only as reliable as the insulation and attic underneath it. Let It Rain can not only replace your roof, but can make sure that it lasts a lifetime.

Aluminum:
To complement your roof installation, Let It Rain Roofing also installs aluminum siding, soffit, fascia, eavestrough and downpipes.

Flat Roofing:
Let It Rain offers flat roof installations and roof replacements for residential and commercial flat roofs.

Repair and Construction:
As a full service roofing contractor, Let it Rain offers roof maintenance and emergency roof repair in Mississauga, Toronto and the GTA.

Downspout Disconnection:
The city of Toronto’s Downspout Disconnection bylaw is now in effect. All Toronto homes must now disconnect downspouts from the city’s sewer system. See how Let it Rain can help you disconnect your downspouts.
services:
Shingle Roof:
At Let It Rain, we install a wide range of roofing shingles, including cedar, slate and fiberglass asphalt shingles. In addition to protecting your roof, our shingles can also improve the aesthetic value of your home because we offer a wide range of shingle colours and profile options.
Insulation & Attic Upgrades

Attic or ceiling insulation and roof ventilation are often ignored but have a large impact on the comfort of your home and the life of your roof. Without proper attic insulation and balanced ventilation, your attic will allow heat to escape, creating damaging moisture and ice build up. Let It Rain knows that attic insulation is an important part of the roof system. With a reliable and functional attic, Let It Rain ensures that your roof installation lasts a lifetime.
Aluminum

Let It Rain’s Aluminum Department offers a range of products and services to enhance the look of your home and protect it from the elements. Our suppliers provide aluminum for eavestrough, soffit and fascia in an array of colours to compliment your existing colour scheme.
Flat Roofing

Let It Rain installs flat roofs for both residential and commercial applications in Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton and all communities in the GTA.
Let It Rain’s Production Manager, Peter Dann, has over 30 years experience in the commercial and residential fields and our professional and courteous crews deliver the highest quality installations of flat roofing. 
Roof Repairs and Construction

Regular maintenance of your roof can extend its life and prevent costly interior damage. Let It Rain’s Repair and Construction department will assist you in resolving a range of roofing related problems on both shingled and flat roofs. Our service extends throughout Mississauga, Toronto and around GTA.

Mandatory Downspout Disconnection

The city of Toronto’s Downspout Disconnection bylaw is now in effect. All Toronto homes must now disconnect downspouts from the city’s sewer system.
specialities:
What you need to know:

The Roofing System consists of three components that should be balanced to work efficiently.

    The Shingled Roof acts as an umbrella shedding water and snow off the building.
    Insulation separates the attic from the house interior creating a comfortable home environment and reducing energy consumption.
    Ventilation moves cool air into the attic and hot air out. It extends the life of the shingles and provides a comfortable living environment

profile:
My name is Harold Spissinger and I have been roofing for 31 years. I have been on the roof doing the actual work for this time and am on the roof for most jobs. My crew of men have been with me for over twenty years ( same guys ) and they are all family men. I have working for me, men who are dedicated professionals who care about the work they do.
     My goal is to provide the best value for the money as I deliver roofing systems done in accordance with the building code, manufacturers specifications(all of which I am extremely familiar) and all the by-laws. This ensures a roofing system which performs very well over long periods of time. All of my men are trained in Fall Protection and have their up-to-date certs by the Ministry of Labour.
products:
SHINGLES: Certainteed,Owens Corning, BP, IKO, GAF.
FLAT ROOFING:modified Bitumen by IKO 
CEDAR:Cedar Bureau approved products
services: Shingle roofing, flat roofing, complete skylight installations including carpentry and interior drywall work, repairs to existing roofs, rafter replacing and repairs including re-sloping of ponding flat roofs, new deck on flat roofs, insulation with the roofs either blown in or baton or styrofoam, all types of metal work including flashings using steel or copper or galvanized metal, aluminum work including gutters, down pipes, siding (siding of vinyl,composite,wood etc.), decks for flat roofs in pressure treated wood, cedar or composite materials.
specialities: Re-raftering collapsing roofs(all carpentry work). Experts at skylight installations (new or repairing existing), 30 year flat roofing systems, 30 year to 50 year shingled roofing systems. Ventilation systems to handle condensation issues. Re-sloping or ponding flat roofs. Termite roofing projects done with termite companys ( I am licenced to spray the roof when its open etc )
payment_method: check, cash or email transfer. NO credit cards

profile:
We are a family run company and have been in the roofing business since 1975. We use most brands of shingles but concentrate on Certainteed Landmark. This product is high-grade and aesthetic. There has been many faulty shingles in recent years so we've turned to Certainteed products to avoid this. We have a friendly crew with a lot of experience, who have a very high quality of work. We take pride in our clean ups.

Call us for a quote and see for yourself.

profile:
​​​​​MJ Guardian Roofing Ltd started off as a small locally owned business here in the GTA. Over the years, we expanded to Barrie, Kitchener and Niagara Falls Areas. The exceptional quality of our workmanship as well as our top customer service have made us one of the biggest and most noted company to service southern central Ontario.

​Our dedication to the craft has generated us a large client base in both residential and commercial roofing. What differentiates us from our competitors is the experience of our workers in the field, our competitive pricing, our flexible scheduling, as well as our commitment to our work.

We currently offer a wide array of roofing related services, including shingle replacements, flat roofs, metal roofs, eaves trough repair and replacements, soffits and fascia, rooftop solar system installation, skylight repair and installation, and attic spray foam insulation. We also cater to new constructions and townhouse co-ops. We prioritize the safety of both our workers as well as you and your family, and are fully insured and licensed. We also offer warranty for all our services.

Call our number today for all your roofing inquiries!​​

Roof repair and Replacement
Aluminum

profile:
Earl W. Smith has been roofing for over 32 years, and established E.W. Smith Roofing in 1979 as a sole proprietorship. As the company expanded, Earl took on a partner - Raymond Mallet, who has over 20 years of roofing experience.

The goal at E. W. Smith Roofing is to provide roofing that is high quality and affordable, but with emphasis on making sure that the job is done right with the best customer service possible.  
 
Services:

Shingles: Asphalt, Cedar, Slate
Flat Roofing: Modified bitman, Built up roofing/BUR/Tar & Gravel/Four Ply.

Eavestrough work: Aluminum, Galvanized steel, Copper, Soffit and Fascia

Chimney work

Skylights

profile:
1 2 3 Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets 1 2 3 Roofing contractors apart.

We hold the accreditation of CertainTeed Shingle Master with CertainTeed St. Gobain, the world leader in shingle manufacturing. The stringent guidelines mandated by CertainTeed in the application of their product allows us to maintain the exceedingly high standards we are reputed for as roofers. 

123 Roofing services South Western Ontario, from Kitchener/Waterloo through, Hamilton, Halton, North York, Vaughan and into Barrie with sloped and flat roofing system replacements, eavestrough, skylight, shingles and attic insulation and ventilation work being our specialities.

Call today and one of our roofing systems consultants will be happy to help!

Forever plus Roofing is a Toronto roofing company, specializing in comprehensive roofing services across the Greater Toronto area.   

We believe our service and quality provides our customers with piece of mind in knowing that the roof they are purchasing will provide superior weather protection today and for years to come. 

Over the years, in Toronto and the GTA had declined due to poor installers, inferior materials, and fly-by-night companies. the reputation of roofers It is our goal to revitalize the roofing industry and provide the highest quality service and products for our customers.

profile:
Amazon Roofing has provided quality roofing to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002. Amazon Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. 

Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. 

You have a lot to protect under one roof.
We are fully licensed and insured.
We offer a 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship, depending on your selection, add 30-year to lifetime product guarantee.

Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets Amazon Roofing contractors apart.

That is why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.

If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job. Surprising to many, our high-quality job does not come with a high price tag!

You can count on us:
The price is right~~

profile:
OUR STORY
Full Service Roofing Provide

TD ROOFING INC is fully licensed, insured to provide Commercial, Residential and Industrial services throughout Ontario. 
The fully certified Roofing professionals are able to complete anything from the most complex and large-scale construction projects to the smallest Roofing repairs.


At TD ROOFING INC we are driven by our commitment to excellence and always go above and beyond to make sure our clients are completely satisfied with our Roofing work. Our attention to details is what sets us apart from other companies in the business.

If you are looking for an Ontario Commercial, Industrial, Residential Roofing Company with experienced, well trained roofing professionals, where the owner is working first hand, shoulder to shoulder with all his team in every stage of the project, TD ROOFING INC is the right choice. We only use high quality materials and offer very competitive pricing.

We supply and install all of the following systems for flat, sloped and metal roofing:

Multi-ply (BUR/SBS)

Single-ply (TPO/PVC)

Shingles (asphalt/cedar/slate)

Residential metal work accessories

Metal Siding
services:
New Roof Construction

Roof Maintenance & Repair

Roof Replacement
specialities:
Asphalt shingles are the most commonly used system on sloped roofs. Asphalt shingles are in a wide variety of colors, styles and shapes. Asphalt shingles developments in durability and performance plus a professional installment ...

COMMERCIAL AND INDUSTRIAL

Built-Up Roofing system (BUR) is one of the oldest and most reliable commercial roofing systems. These roof systems often referred to as "tar and gravel" roofs. BUR consists of multiply plies of roof felts laminated together with bitumen ...

METAL SIDING

A residential roofing system must be outfitted with a metal soffit, fascia, eaves trough and downpipe. The soffit exists at the perimeter of the roof allowing air to pass through the roof structure for necessary ventilation. The fascia flashes the perimeter.

profile: At one point in their life, homeowners will have to deal with roofing problems, be it through repair and renovation or during the initial roof installation. It is one of those housing problems that are almost impossible to ignore for both the residential and commercial homeowners. Nobody would be comfortable living in a house with leaking or collapsing roof; it is not only dangerous to your life, your loved ones or your tenants, but also unhygienic and unhealthy. Also. there have been a lot of reported cases of tenants suing landlords/ladies for damages due to such eventualities, trust me you don’t want to be part of it. You, therefore, need a roofing partner who will always be there with you at every step of your home improvement process; that’s where Sparkle Roofing contractors come in.

Protect your landscape from the effects of flooding by having custom-designed retaining walls installed by our professionals. Call for your service.

The skilled masons from Masonry Doctors can install decorative stairs for your landscape. We can also repair your damaged steps. Call for more details.

Rely on the professionals at Masonry Doctors for all of your foundation and basement repair needs. Hire us today and get 15% OFF all our foundation or basement services.

Whether you need chimney rebuilding, repairing, or repointing services, Masonry Doctors does it all. Contact us today for a FREE estimate.

Our experts work with all roofing material and installation types. So, whether your roof is flat or pitched; on a home or commercial property, we are your best choice.

profile:
ABOUT SHANDYMAN CONTRACTING

ShandyMan Contracting is one of Toronto's most trusted General Contractors, specializing in Roofing, Painting and Carpentry & Renovations.

Whether it be a commercial or residential design or repair, The ShandyMan Team prides themselves on their results and happy customers.

CORE VALUES

PEOPLE
This core value runs deep in the Shand family - passed down from Shane’s father who worked very hard to leave a legacy worth following. You can see it on the faces of friends, family, employees and customers of ShandyMan Contracting Inc. Love and leadership is at the centre of this organization.

PASSION
One has to be passionate about their craft in order to be successful in this business - it can be tough and the work isn’t always pretty. For anyone who’s ever worked with "The ShandyMan", the first thing you’ll notice is his passion for life, family and work. Passion is wildly reflected in ShandyMan Contracting’s long lasting relationships and successful projects across the Greater Toronto Area.

PURPOSE
Founder, Shane Shand truly believes in living a life of purpose and meaning. ShandyMan Contracting provides that opportunity for its employees through the example Shane and his team have been setting from an early age. Growing up in Toronto’s Beaches, and learning from his father, he now brings over 20 years of experience as a General Contractor with key specialities. Shane is now able to live out his own dream through the art of enhancing commercial and residential properties.

SHANE SHAND
FOUNDER & PRESIDENT

THE SHANDYMAN STORY
MEET OUR FOUNDER & PRESIDENT SHANE SHAND THE "SHANDYMAN"
Born and raised in Toronto's Beaches Community, Shane and his team bring over 20 years of experience in residential and commercial General Contracting. ShandyMan Contracting services a variety of clients across the Greater Toronto Area and beyond. Specialties include; roofing, painting and carpentry. ShandyMan's mission, vision and core values are the guide to transforming your space.

EVERY DAY IS A BLESSED DAY. 

https://www.instagram.com/shandyman_contracting/
https://www.facebook.com/ShandymanContracting/

profile:
PerfectHomes Roofing is  a full service residential roofing company specializing in roof  repair and replacement. Our experienced team of roofing professionals can  handle any residential  roofing project. Whether you need to repair or replace your roof on your  single family home, townhome, or any other type of residential building, we can  and will get the job done. We are equipped to handle large/small roofing  projects in Toronto, Markham and most of the GTA area.


 We understand that every roof is different. Each home has a unique set of considerations to factor into a repair, re-shingling, or replacement project. for the past 20 years Anax overhead Doors is the choice of Builders ,new homes and commercial business,property managements eta .

Garage Doors

profile:
Roof Solution has been servicing the GTA neighborhood since 2004. We specialize in all kinds of residential, commercial, industrial, and institutional new roof installations.
 
For your protection, mandatory safety and periodical workshop-style training sessions are received by all company employees in order to maintain our best performance at all times. We are fully compliant with the Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB) regulations. All of our employees maintain the highest standards of craftsmanship in completing every project. The best solution and price is offered for every customer on each job, based on the request and needs. Our powerful construction network can also provide the same quality workmanship on many other home improvements to meet one's satisfaction while saving money and time for our customers.
 
Our knowledgeable and well-trained staff are fully responsible for your business and home. It is the key to success for our business to ensure a pleasant experience for each customer.
 
Call us today for a free quote at 416-838-4062!

profile:
Skilled Shingle and Flat Roofers in North York - Residential & Commercial

Are you seeking professional help for your roofing needs in North York? If yes, your quest has come to an end at Roofing Vesely Contracting Inc. Our trained and experienced shingle and flat roofers provide residential and commercial roofing services such as installations, repairs, replacements, including eavestrough and gutter cleaning with top-quality workmanship in Mississauga, Brampton, and areas within a 150 km radius of Toronto, covering all of the GTA regions. At Roofing Vesely Contracting Inc, we focus on providing top-of-the-line service from start to finish to our clients. Our team of professionals is capable of identifying the best solution for all your roofing problems, be it broken shingles or poorly maintained flat roofs. Connect with our team, and we'll provide a free estimate before we start the project.

We are following all the health and safety guidelines to ensure we're keeping our customers and employees safe.

profile:
Welcome to Upper Canada Roofing Company. We bring with us extensive experience installing and servicing fine cedar, slate, copper and asphalt roofs in the Greater Toronto Area since 1988. Our team is led by Brent who is a third generation roofer and has over 40 years of experience in the business.

We owe our success to the great partnerships we have with our clients which last a lifetime. We work in collaboration with our clients to create one of a kind designs featuring exceptional materials and workmanship. Our team will work with you to design something that perfectly suits your home.

Our uncompromising quality, commitment and attention to detail lead to a Premium Quality roof that will last longer than its expected life cycle.

Our service include:
*Roofing repair and maintenance
*Cedar roofing: shakes, shingles and siding
*Decorative cedar shingles, custom designed and hand fabricated
*Slate roofing installation and repair
*Copper roofing and eavestroughs
*Asphalt shingles installation and repair
*Certainteed Roofing Products
*Historical Restoration of Roofs
*Solar roof tiles (Building Integrated Photovoltaic (BIPV))

Rooftop Renovation
Our new business is now launching a ‘Rooftop Renovation’ package. We understand that this industry is full of high-priced services. The total price of our service is 25% lower than our competitor’s prices. The company has a professional roof business license.

Overall Roof Renovation Package

Our roof refurbishment process

The customer selects ‘Shingle’ which refers to the “Asphalt shingle”. Most of our roofs are used in this process. Previously mainly used a triple old fashioned tile. What is the latest process using an Architectural for 30 years? First of all, to remove the previous tile on the roof, you discovered that Shingle is just the “skin” of the roof, and there is a layer of Underlayment below it. “paper”. It is mainly used for waterproofing. Like Shingle, the paper and Shingle are already firmly glued together. In addition, there are chimneys and vents on the roof. There are waterproof boards under them. The name Flashing is linked to Paper and Shingle. Therefore, it is also necessary to “eradicate” together. After shovelling it off, the bone on the roof is left. It is a deck. The wooden boards on the roof are also divided into solid wood and plywood. If any rotten boards are found and there are holes in the boards, they must be replaced or replaced first. Then go in the opposite direction and begin to spread new paper on the board. In order not to let the rain drop down the eaves, we will install a drip rim “Drip Eidge” along the eaves. Then start Shingle from the bottom of the eaves. From bottom to top, from the right to the left, a piece of cloth, this is a repetitive work, meet the vents, to replace the flashing. Finally, the completion of the Ridge cap was nearly completed. Also note that in addition to paving tiles neatly, the main job is nailing, which is to hit the nails. The nails are good enough to play T deep and play tight. The most prone to problems are the protruding roofs, double inspections of the exhausts and chimneys, the cleaning of roof tile sinks after the replacement of roof parts, and the ground cleaning. Completing the photo shoot of the roof after the completion of the old and new contrast and key waterproof pictures send text messages to the owners to stay at the end of ten years of maintenance.

What refurbishment roof package?

It is a kind of roof roof total cost calculated by calculating the total roof area X using the number of roof tiles. You can measure your own roof quotation by yourself. At a clear price, you will not need to pay any fees for one-stop service. Can be added or subtracted according to customer’s request

What is not included in the roof renewal package?

profile:
Professional Toronto Roofing Company | Royal Roofing Inc.
Welcome to ROYAL ROOFING Inc. 
 
Our company provides superior customer service. Serving Toronto and the GTA, our roofing installation team is able to work skillfully and efficiently to complete your project in a timely manner. We will arrive when we say we will and we will assess your home and provide you with recommendations and the alternatives that exist. We will provide you with a written estimate itemizing what will be done and the materials to be used.

Why Choose Us As Your ROYAL ROOFING Inc?

    * Jobs are completed to high standards on time with minimal impact
    * Backed by warranty and proven reputation
    * Protection and peace of mind
    * Protect personal property and neighbourly relations
    * Guarantee customer satisfaction, stand by warranty

Our Services Include
*Residential: Roof Replacement, Sloped Roof, Asphalt Roof Shingles, Cedar Roof, Cedar Shingles vs Shakes, Clay Roofing, Concrete & Cement Roofing, Slate Roofing, Gutter Installation, Roof Inspection, Roofing Repair
*Commercial: Industrial Roofing, Flat Roofing, Industrial Roof Repair, Commercial Roofing Estimate
*Repairs: Shingle, Flat Roof, Cedar Roof, Metal Roof, Tile Repair (clay, slate, concrete), Roof Inspection & Maintenance
*Flat Roof Replacement / Installation: Modified Bitumen / Torch On System, EPDM System, Roll Roofing
*Metal Roofing Systems: Aluminum, Copper, Steel, Corrugated, Lead, Tin

profile:
M&R Roofing provides the highest quality and professional residential and commercial roofing services in Toronto and surrounding areas. 

SERVICES: We provide a complete range of roofing related services including the replacement and repairs of sloped and flat roofs, related carpentry and sheet metal work. See our services listing below.

INSPECTIONS: Our roof inspections and resulting estimates are complete, detailed and thorough outlining all material specifications and installation procedures. Thermal infrared imaging inspections are also available. 

EDUCATION: We take pride in the acquisition and application of building knowledge. We hold the following certificates, degrees and diplomas. Certainteed Master Shingle Applicator and Quality Master, Soprema T-02 Basic Techniques, Soprema Advanced Techniques PAQ+S, Velux Certified Installer, Roofing Technology, Maintenance and Inspection Course, University of Toronto Building Science, Lexcan TPO Training course, University of Toronto Commerce and Economics with High Distinction.

SAFETY AND INSURANCE: The meeting of health and safety regulations is our minimum standard.  We are members of all required regulatory bodies. All of our employees are covered by WSIB and are certified in WHMIS, fall protection and propane handling training.  We are fully insured an bonded including in the application of torch down rubber membranes.

COVID 19 UPDATE: We are open for business and are here to take your calls, emails and virtual meetings if needed to provide you with detailed information and quotes for your project. We are following the health and safety regulations set out by the Province of Ontario and maintaining our social distance at the job site. We look forward to hearing from you. 

****

Mario's Roofing is a leading roof installation company assisting the homeowners with reliable roofing services, right from the inspection to repair and replacement. Our services are: Roof Installation, Roof Repair, Roof Inspection, Roof Restoration, Shingle Installation, Asphalt Roof Installation, Slate Roofing Installation, Flat Roof Installation, Residential Re-Roofing and Shingle Roof Replacement, and Gutter Installation. No matter, you want a flat or a shingle roof, our residential roofers are skilled in installing them all. We also specialize in gutter/ eavestrough installation. Our service areas include Mississauga, Brampton, Burlington, Milton, and Georgetown. We realize the importance of having a durable roof over your head and promise to deliver the best in everything we do. Our priority is customer satisfaction and we strive to achieve it at every cost. Contact us today to schedule your appointment.


***

Why Choose Us? 

***

* Marios Roofing has a trained team of roofers who install and repair roofs as per the local building standards. You can rely on us for efficiency and workmanship.

* Quality Installation

* Years of Experience

* 100% Satisfaction

* Affordable Pricing

profile:
A Family of Roofers for 3 Generations

Our roofing company is family owned and operated and has been serving the Toronto area for 65 years. We specialize in residential roofing from complete roof replacement to partial repair. We only use the best materials and are dedicated to completing each project in a timely manner. All of our staff are experienced and certified and have been with us for at least 10 years. We hold ongoing training and safety seminars to ensure up-to-date styles and techniques.

We have the perfect roofing solution for your home. We price our products fairly and work hard to make sure that our customers get exactly what they order. We're committed to helping you figure out what best fits your needs and budget. We're happy to answer all your questions and to give you a free quote. 

We are fully licensed and insured and have been a member of the BBB for over 25 years. We offer full manufacturer's warranties for all new services provided.

Roofing Services Provided:
Shingles
Roof Repairs
Double Ply Rooking Systems
Gutter Replacements
Sidewalls
Roof 'Tune ups'
Roof Inspections
Vinyl and Aluminum Siding

profile:
Luso Roofing & Sheet Metal is a family owned and operated company located in Toronto, Ontario. The Majority of our roofers have 30+ years of roofing experience, offering quality workmanship and expert service.

With this many years of experience, it’s no wonder that 95% of Luso Roofing’s business is by referral from past and current roofing customers. Luso Roofing & Sheet Metal is an Ontario Registered Roofing Contractor who has Comprehensive Liability Insurance (Insured) and has Workers Compensation (WSIB).

Luso Roofing & Sheet Metal is a roofing contractor who specializes in the Repair, Replacement, Maintenance, and Installation of Residential and Commercial Roofing systems for the needs of their clients.

profile:
We offer Free Roofing Estimates, quality service from the removal of old roofing, repair of sub roofing and the install of new shingles to protect your home from ice damage & the elements and give your home the designer look you always wanted!

One of the latest ongoing trends in roofing styles is the Architectural style of shingles these are reminiscent of slate and cedar shingles without the high cost of those materials. For homeowners who want extra durability and protection, select IKO`s Cambridge premium architectural shingles. Cambridge combines beauty with contemporary strength. Manufactured in a larger size to offer more exposure and create a high definition ''shake'' look for your roof, these popular shingles are versatile and easy to maintain and come in a myriad of colors that can suit any home. The Cambridge shingle features an algae resistant granule.

Marathon 25 and 25 AR shingles are a time-tested, traditional three-tab shingle. Traditional 3-tab design shingles. Available in a wide range of colors, the Marathon 25 shingle instantly makes your home a classic. Offering excellent reliability and supported by a proven track record, these shingles are at the top of their class in terms of performance and value. Marathon 25 AR shingles feature an algae resistant granule and a limited 25-Year Warranty. When it`s time to choose or replace your roof, look no further for a shingle that offers unbeatable protection and value
services: Shingles - Cedar - Flat Roofs - Eaves troughs -Sheet Metal -Quality Roofing - Quality Repairs - Ice Damage repairs

DDK Roofing is proud to be serving the GTA all the way north to huntsville and we can do jobs of all sizes. We provide comprehensive roofing and home exterior services to Barrie and surrounding areas. We specialize in commercial and residential flats, shingles, custom copper, metal, soffit, fascia, trough and more. We provide a 24-hour emergency repair and all seasonal preparedness. Call for a free estimate today! Whether you need a simple roof repair or inspection or a full roof replacement, we have the product and expertise necessary to complete the job. profile:
Premier Roofing Group Inc. proudly serves the Greater Toronto Area. We are committed to the use of quality materials, excellent workmanship, and one-on-one customer care. Currently, we specialize in: commercial and residential roof replacement, repairs and emergency service, preventative maintenance, and skylight/smoke hatch installation and maintenance. We also offer roof inspections at a competitive price. Our roofing experts are up to date on new products and building materials to help keep your home safe. We are fully-insured, licensed and bonded. We provide a FREE in-home consultation. Contact us today to book a consultation at 647-330-9104.

Covid - 19 Update: We are following all of the health and safety guidelines as set out by the Province of Ontario and city of Toronto to ensure the safety of our customers and employees.

BATHROOM AND KITCHEN RENOVATIONS

profile:
Archer Roofing is a full service roofing company serving clients in Kelowna, BC. We undertake roof replacements and roof repairs of both shingled and flat roofs. Visit archer.ca for more information about our services and the company history. 

For over 25 years we have focused on uncompromising workmanship and quality materials, which can be seen in some of the best homes in the city.

Since 1989, Archer Roofing (Archer Construction Group Ltd.) has completed hundreds of projects throughout the city. Its focus has always remained on roofing and remodelling of Home Interiors, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Basements, and Fine Finish Carpentry and Millwork. The company is licenced, insured, and Renomark registered. profile:
Seven Star Roofing is a prominent roofing firm servicing GTA, Oakville, Oshawa, Burlington and Newmarket. Qualified to operate on both residential and commercial buildings, we are able to meet all your needs in a professional manner.
 
We specialize in shingle roof replacement and repair, and flat roof installation. Our related services include eaves trough, fascia, soffit, downspout, skylight.
Our firm is bonded, licensed and fully insured, and all our roofers are safety-trained. We carry full service warranties.
 
​
It is our goal that we not just meet the expectations of our customers but exceed them. Quality is what we put above everything else. While maintaining the highest roofing standards, we at the same time try to keep the costs as low as possible, so that our services can be accessible to lower-income people.
Roofing is competitive business. Our professionalism, promptness and dedication to quality have won us good reputation in this field throughout GTA. If you are looking for a responsible and respectable roofing firm, look no further.
name: Seven Star Roofing

profile:
Welcome to Cadillacs Roofing. If you have noticed a problem with your roof, such as leaking, blistering, shrinkage, holes, water pooling or billowing, it may be time to call a professional roofing company. Call Cadillacs Roofing today and take a step towards rectifying any issues your roof is experiencing. We work with high quality products to ensure your home is properly protected for any weather. Full service with drip edge, ice and water shield, synthetic underlayment, and certainteed landmark shingles.

***

If you know that your roof needs replacement, we’ll arrange a meeting with one of the roofing experts. Together we will talk about the longest lasting and the best looking roof for your home. Schedule a roof replacement cost estimate today!

***

Service Areas Include but not limited to: Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Georgetown, Oakville, Burlington, Milton, North York, Richmond Hill, Markham, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Vaughan, New Market, Aurora, Caledon, Orangeville.

profile:
As a locally owned roofing company, licensed and insured, we ensure our quality and service to a high degree. 

For over 10 years, our workers have been travelling to every corner in Greater Toronto Area to serve everyone in need, we guarantee your satisfaction on our price, our work and service.

We specialize in all kinds of residential, commercial, industrial, and institutional new roof installations and repairs. 

For your protection, mandatory safety and periodical workshop style training sessions are received by all company employees in order to maintain our best performance at all times. We are fully compliant with the Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB) regulations.  

Our knowledgeable and well-trained staff are fully responsible for your business and home. It is the key to success for our business to ensure a pleasant experience for each customer.

For your protection we are fully insured and licensed. We always provide free written estimates and free online estimates.

We have the ability and resources to self-perform cast-in-place concrete and rebar placement, carpentry, drywall/acoustical ceilings, minor excavation and general conditions.

profile:
Roofing is our business and we’ve been building gorgeous, durable roofs for residential houses for more than ten years. We specialize in many areas of roofing installation, repair and upgrades. In addition to maintenance of the roof itself, we service the parts of a roof that frequently get overlooked such as the soffit, fascia and eaves-trough. A consultation with one of our roofing professionals will determine exactly what type of services we can offer to sustain the integrity of your roof and the supporting structures.
Our services:
Sloped Roofs | Aluminum Work | Copper Work | Carpentry | Skylights | Flat Roofs

profile:
» Roofing » Gutters & Eavestroughs » Siding » Decks » Masonry & Bricklaying » Insulation » Skylights » Windows & Doors

Since 1939, Contex Roofing Toronto has been providing exterior solutions that enhance and beautify residential and commercial properties all over the Greater Toronto Area, including Pickering, Mississauga, Brampton, and Richmond Hill.

Our range of services includes a variety of roofing applications, flats, shingles, chimneys, decks, as well as specialty services such as skylights, eavestroughs, sidings, custom copper and sheet metal work. We make certain that your exterior is both durable and aesthetically beautiful.

As one of the oldest roofing companies, Contex has the experience necessary to make sure the job is done right. Most of our business comes from referrals and repeat clients because we can guarantee the finest possible craftsmanship and the best available materials. Contact us today to get a team of professionals started on your facilities.

Roof Repair 
With our 100% Guarantee on all materials and workmanship, having your Roof Repaired by MX Roofing is one of the best investments you can make in your home. profile:
Protect your home from damage caused by the elements with roofing services by Panda Roofing. We provide professional roof repair and maintenance in GTA and surrounding areas of the GTA for local home and business owners. Our experienced team is committed to delivering exceptional workmanship using top quality roofing materials, and we are fully licensed for your protection and peace of mind.
At Panda Roofing, we do a lot more than roof repair. Call on us to repair, maintain, and install a range of components to your
roofing system, including skylights, Eavestroughs , gutters, chimneys, leaf guards and more. Additionally, we provide professional trapping, sink repair, cleaning, and replacement, tank cleaning, repair and installation, and more.
As a locally owned roofing company, Liscensed and insured, we ensure our quality and service to a high degree.
For over 15 years, our workers has been travelling to every corner in Greater Toronto Area to serve everyone in need, we guarantee your satisfaction on our price, our work and service.
Our commitment is to provide the best service with a better material at a lower price.
Free Estimate please Call: 647-296-7881    [Roy]
